website_summaries.verdict: For health-conscious snackers with preferences for sweets, these bars are worth considering – numerous varieties and simple, real ingredients.
pros: Tops the competitors for their impressive variety, as they are available in nut, fruit, and chocolate lovers' flavors
cons: Texture is on the heavy and coarse side
Some varieties have more sugar than others

customer_reviews.title: Moldy, smelly, disgusting in the last 2 orders
customer_reviews.text: I love larabars. What I don’t love, and what earned this one star, is that my last 2 orders have been spoiled. Like, literally smell-like-windex, something-that-looks-mold on the bars. I don’t know if they had a bad batch or it’s due to how they are storing it at amazon, but I’m no longer ordering this on a recurring basis and will just buy locally where I know a grocery store will protect their product.
customer_reviews.author: Acid Rain

customer_reviews.title: These have changed and not for the better  :(
customer_reviews.text: We used to love these. Chocolate chip cookie dough was our favorite. The latest box - not so much. We wondered if we had received a bad batch. After reading reviews, we think we may have figured out the problem. The recipe/ingredients have changed and now include apples. I have nothing against apples, but I'm certainly not looking for Apple flavor in my chocolate chip cookie dough. I was going to purchase another box while they are cheaper. But, having tasted the new recipe, I deleted the new box from my cart. Yuck. Bring back the original recipe please!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough flavor ruined
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough flavor of Larabars every month for years. In February of 2019, I started getting boxes that had apples added to the ingredients. The apple flavor is very sharp and ruins the cookie dough flavor of the bar. I'm so disappointed. I love Larabars, but will be moving to another flavor now. I just hope I can find one I like as much.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients have changed
customer_reviews.text: The ingredient list has changed and now includes apples. Both my kids commented that the taste was weird. Ingredients: Cashews, dates, semisweet chocolate chips (unsweetened chocolate, sugar, cocoa butter, vanilla), apples, sea salt, vanilla extract.
customer_reviews.author: SVMum

customer_reviews.title: Mold issues and drying out. Bars taste great when packaged correctly
customer_reviews.text: Normally I would give these 5 stars. My son loves these and I feel like he is getting a healthier option than all those other granola bars that have so many extra unnecessary ingredients. But I am very unhappy with the packaging. Something is wrong with either their machines or their quality control. Several bars had to be thrown away because of mold issues and others were dry because the package wasn't sealed completely.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: I like the larabar's but if I'm going to have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Found plastic in larabar as I was eating it. This is the second time this has happened and both times the product has come from Amazon. And it usually tends to happen with the chocolate chip cookie dough flavor. I like the larabar's but if I'm going to have to be paranoid about will plastic be in it this time then I may have to stop ordering...
customer_reviews.author: Ladybird

customer_reviews.title: Larabars are the best
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars. I have zero brand loyalty to any other brands, but in the crowded “bar” space, Larabar has my undying loyalty. They just do it right! Simple, whole ingredients that taste great in just the right texture at a great price point. And chocolate chip cookie dough and peanut butter chocolate chip are my very favorite Larabars. They feel indulgent - and are, to some degree: these have 210 calories and 15g of sugar. I wouldn’t really call this a health food. But damn do they taste good! And the whole ingredients (these are chock full of cashews and dates) make them a healthier alternative to reaching for an actual cookie or other dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I buy these every month through S&S. For several ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every month through S&S. For several months in a row they came completely out of the box and all smashed up. After complaining they finally added stickers to the box. Now I just received 2 boxes and they are completely different and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Aria S.

customer_reviews.title: Ad says 4 ingredients; actual product says 6!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Larabars mainly because they have only the 4 ingredients -- or at least, that's how it was in the past. I received the product, but now the box says a big 6 where the 4 used to be, and the bars also include apples and vanilla, neither of which I want. I'm disappointed and will not be eating these.
customer_reviews.author: Imjustsayin

customer_reviews.title: MOLDY
customer_reviews.text: MOLDY!!! I buy these at the store all the time so I figured I would buy a box in bulk. They were all moldy and had to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Same size box, less bars
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars and my husband and I have eaten them for years. However, the changed packaging is extremely consumer un-friendly!. The box is almost the same size, just slightly changed dimensions, however they are much harder to open and have only 10 instead of 16 bars inside. The 16-bar boxes are easy to open and bars are (with lid removed or open) easily accessible, the 10-bar boxes don't rip open cleanly, stand on their side and don't provide easy access. What a wasteful way for a company to spend their money, this box is not an improvement but rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Callison

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, with only a few ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the ingredients of Larabars are all natural and easy to pronounce! (Nuts, fruit, chocolate, etc.) These are yummy and satisfying and my husband, son, and I love them. They are great to take to a soccer game or to pack in a lunchbox. This variety can get melty if it's too hot because of the chocolate, but other varieties (apple, blueberry, etc.) hold up fine in the heat. A great portable snack to tide you over till dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Rustie C. Dimitriadis

customer_reviews.title: I may just not like these bars...
customer_reviews.text: They aren't BAD... I may just not like the texture or flavor profile provided by the dates. I've tried a few flavors now, and nothing really makes me want to reorder. Like I said, they're not terrible, I just don't care for them. They were fresh, and probably as they were intended to be, but I'm not a big fan. They melt pretty easily and I'd rather just get a regular granola bar or piece of fruit as a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: I normally love Larabars, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too pleased with this product. Normally, I love Larabars - I've tried many different varieties, this type included! However, the two bars that I've opened so far from my box have had some sort of either fuzz from another source or mold on them (pictures included). The expiration date is 5/6/18.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Hulsebus

customer_reviews.title: They are OK, not fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think the flavor folks at Larabar have made Chocolate Chip Cookies and tasted the dough... LOL we'll eat these for nutrition when we don't want to fix "real" food, but in our house it isn't grabbed as a great tasting snack.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Actual food in here!
customer_reviews.text: If you have never tried LaraBar, starting with the cookie dough is an amazing choice. Yes, it has more than two ingredients, but the ingredients are REAL, and incredibly yummy. They don't have a coating on them, so they can get a bit sticky on a warm day, but no complaints here. Just makes it more like a warm cookie! I highly recommend this brand to people who like real food like nuts, paired with sweetness from fruits. Super yum!
customer_reviews.author: BecsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat of a gamble - but not your average poison!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about these Lara Bars - my wife really loves them. The ingredients are great considering the awful products on the shelves these days. With that said, I have a few issues with these as well. They're expensive! I have them on subscribe and save and get he discount, but I wish they were cheaper. Also, sometimes they show up looking and tasting not so fresh. You can tell when they are fresh because they're not mushed and a different color. I wish it wasn't a gamble every time I got them. Still, despite the downsides, these are great and I would recommend them over the toxic snacks on the shelves at grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: Marc R

customer_reviews.title: Taste Okay
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love the Blueberry Muffin bars. I thought I'd try this flavor instead. They are okay, but I don't love the flavor. I like it okay with hot chocolate or coffee. Of course, taste varies from person to person. I probably won't order this flavor again, but I definitely will the blueberry muffin.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vance

customer_reviews.title: These are great - until you get the MOLDY ones
customer_reviews.text: I've had these on subscribe'nsave, and have loved them until today. Brand new box - opened first bar and thank Gawd I looked because it's got mold all over it. Just ew. Trust broken. Cancelled subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Mold!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this same product in the past and it was fine.(With and expiration date at least a year away) This time the expiration date was only 3 months out (Dec 2016) and there has been mold on many of the bars once opened. I am unable to find an email address to ask for a replacement or a refund! I am not allowing my daughter to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: nancy m wilson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These specific bars are disgusting! The package when arrived was in pefect condition and nothing seemed to be out of order. However, when i went to open the packaging of the bars I was met with a gross beef jerky type of smell. Opon further inspection and tasting the bar, it tasted even worse than it smelled. I don't know if i recieved a bad batch but it get's my thumbs down!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first when I decided to start eating protein bars as a mid-day snack. They are delicious and very chocolatey, did not skimp on taste. Very soft and moist. I purchase a box of 20 and the price was less than $2.00 a bar. Plan to purchase again. This is my favorite flavor!!
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: moldy when opened bar. expiration date says august 2018
customer_reviews.text: This is the third box of these I've gotten from amazon and this is the first time this has happened but the bars are moldy. they were just delivered today. I honestly feel like I don't even want to eat these bars anymore after this - it grosses me out.
customer_reviews.author: Witchy woman

customer_reviews.title: Something's off...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I love the chocolate chip cookie dough bars, but something is off about them. They don't taste the same and have some sort of a chemical taste to them. These were my favorite bars because they actually tasted like chocolate chip cookie dough to me, but these are far from it. I was genuinely concerned I got a knock-off when I bit into the first bar. Needless to say, I won't be purchasing these online again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Check For Mold
customer_reviews.text: First time I have had to write a review of this nature, but this particular box of Larabars was bad before the expiration date. My daughter is vegan and eats these daily. When she opened one up she noticed mold on the side of the bar. We opened another one up to check and see if it was moldy as well, and it was. The expiration date on the box says 17 APR 2018. The bars should still be good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little stale
customer_reviews.text: Have gotten these in the past and loved the flavor. Almost like a little dessert cookie bar. But this box that I got wasn't very good. The bars seem a little stale. I checked the expiration date, and it's not expired, so not sure why that is. The box was crushed during transport, leaving a few of the bars a little smushed.
customer_reviews.author: burgerslam

customer_reviews.title: NASTY!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew that something could be slimy and gritty at the same time, and taste like crap on top of that! I couldn't get past the first bite. I'll save them for when I'm starving to death. I hope I never have to eat them. YUCK!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. Tasty and cheaper than buying at the store individually.
customer_reviews.author: VLNeetle

customer_reviews.title: yucky
customer_reviews.text: did it like the taste of these at all. when i received them, i was very surprised what they looked like and tasted like. imo- the description is misleading. anyway- i threw mine out after i took one bite. i do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Mold on the Bars!!
customer_reviews.text: We continue to open these bars and they have mold on them. I'm super disappointed in this because we usually like Larabars and feel like it's such a waste of money. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Mcleod

customer_reviews.title: Molded.
customer_reviews.text: All bars in this shipment contain mold inside the wrapper. Some bars are worse than others. The pictures are from two different bars.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Yummy bars, box problem
customer_reviews.text: I have to be dairy free at the moment, so these bars are a great snack. My bars looked fine, and the expiration date is several months out. Main issue is that the 16 packs come in the kind of box used for store display shelves, so they aren’t factory sealed. Makes me a little nervous to receive a food item with a box held together by clear tape.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Excellent when not dry
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, almost candy bar like in sweetness. These bars used to arrive somewhat moist and they are excellent in that state. Recent shipments are mix quality because some boxes have bars that are very dry and hence the taste is less appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kalifungwa

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Mmm! Chewy, cookie goodness! Without all the bad! I have been a long-time Larabar lover, and this Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is my favorite out of the; Peanut Butter Cookie, Apple Pie, and Cherry Pie, that I have tried. I would like to try the Brownie one sometime. So far though, this Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is the best of the ones I've tried. It's sweet enough, not way overly sweet and has a nice satisfying effect. Perfect for breakfast pairing, or a snack throughout the afternoon. I am a Holistic Health & Wellness Coach, and I recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every Larabar that's not overpriced and this is far and away my favorite. As an added bonus it also satisfies your chocolate craving! Which is really helpful a lot of the time. Great as a part of breakfast, snack, or, as I frequently eat it, a healthy dessert. Delicious every time.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy snack with healthy ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Healthy ingredients with appealing flavors - quick and easy snack for on-the-go. Can be a bit messy in the summer heat, but overall a good flavor and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: About as good as an all fruit/nut bar is gonna get.
customer_reviews.text: I want to like these bars, but because they're really & truly all-natural, they're not gonna taste like a Cliff Bar. They taste like dried fruit & nuts, because that's what's in them! This particular bar is my #2 because it has a little acidic aftertaste that's at odds with the chocolate. Peanut Butter Choc Chip is the best. Also worth trying: Cherry Pie. Don't leave these guys in the sun. They turn to goo.
customer_reviews.author: mconnery

customer_reviews.title: So good! So tasty! The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about Lärabars other than they are THE BEST! I am still amazed at how they can use so few completely natural ingredients and turn out such a tasty bar, that is not only delicious but healthy! I can replace an entire meal with one or two of these, mixing up the various flavors. So good!! I wish I'd discovered them years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Niilo T.

customer_reviews.title: Best Kind Of Lara Bars!
customer_reviews.text: I love Lara bars and these are my favorite kind! It’s such a great deal for this box. Much cheaper than what I would get in the store and they taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi B

customer_reviews.title: Dry and Stale
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these at Hannafords for years and since COVID-19 has been around I haven't been able to go so I ordered on Amazon. They are usually fresh and the dates have moisture to them making it like actually cookie dough consistency. These were dry and kind of crumbly. The date was still good, so I'm not sure if they got too warm in shipping wherever they came from, but it happened before it got to me because its been in the 30's here. Will not be buying again online.
customer_reviews.author: anniebananievt

customer_reviews.title: Apple cookie dough?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man that apple flavor. Gross. It’s totally ruin the flavor of an otherwise tasty bar. I’ve been forcing these down for the last two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Swampy

customer_reviews.title: Squished
customer_reviews.text: Someone sat on my breakfast. Seriously box was in an envelope and looks as though it was beaten with a shoe. I guess this is what we resort to in a Pandemic. won't let me add a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: delicious & (for me) IBD safe
customer_reviews.text: IBD can be a pain... The chocolate chip cookie dough LARABAR is a relatively safe food for me, even during a mild flare. The ingredient list: Cashews, dates, chocolate chips, and salt. The cashews aren't ground completely into a nut butter. There are some small cashew pieces, which may present a problem for some. The flavor is pretty good, and the chocolate is usually strong enough to overcome mild off-flavors from medications (think metallic tasting antibiotics). The calorie density is such that a few of these allow me to keep my weight up. They're a great source of fat. (Not so much protein though.)
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and have actually helped me lose weight recently. The taste is wonderful, and one bar allows me to stay full for at least six hours. I will absolutely continue to buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: AH2113

customer_reviews.title: The first one I opened was fine. the next 4 were all moldy
customer_reviews.text: The first one I opened was fine. the next 4 were all moldy. I live on these things - it was not a normal white or fuzz that was on them. The date said it doesnt expire till april of 2018. Must have been resold from a flood or something. DO not buy from here!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: DRY, old not sure why??
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these so we try to keep them in stock. This last order that we purchased was really disappointing. EVERY SINGLE BAR was rock hard and dry. They must have been borderline expired or missing an ingredient. We were very disappointed and couldn’t even finish the whole box. We will try again in hopes that this was a one off situation. Larabars are usually moist and easy to eat but these were dry old and disappointing
customer_reviews.author: stephen myers

customer_reviews.title: I got stale bars. Buy from the store instead.
customer_reviews.text: These bars tasted like they had been frozen or heated and then put in the box to come to me. They were mealy and stale. I’ve had them from the store before and know they should not taste like this.
customer_reviews.author: Nikko

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: These are tasty and filling and I love eating them knowing they are gluten free, safe for me to eat with IBS and a colon disease and can be eaten at home or on the go. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: MinneapolisVinylRind

customer_reviews.title: Do not like flavor
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the flavor of Larabars. This is the 4th flavor I’ve tried. They are too sticky and mostly taste like dates.
customer_reviews.author: A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quick snack
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it! I'm breastfeeding and my son has a dairy, soy and egg allergies. Having a delicious snack that goes with our diet is awesome. Only wish it had more protein!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: my entire house goes crazy for these. They are by far the best flavor Lara bar. So decadent and nutritious! Can't beat it
customer_reviews.author: Courtney "Mother of Plants" Smith

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging
customer_reviews.text: No protection against heat and no protection against crushing. Package arrived all melted and crushed. Edible but horrible mash up of the original bars.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Sweet cravings
customer_reviews.text: Perfect treat for my sweet tooth. I love The texture of nuts and chocolate chips and dates. Can’t just stop at one
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My daughter is VERY picky and I love that I can get her to eat these-- gives her some healthy variety in her lunches. This is the only flavor of LaraBar that she likes.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact snack
customer_reviews.text: Tasty treat that is very filling. Has a lot of sugar tho. Ate these when i needed a quick work snack or some fuel before gym. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Chris Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love Lara Bars!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are heathier than most sweet snacks. They're a great treat for the health conscious person who wants a little sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Going Green Girl

customer_reviews.title: Tasty with no artificial sweetener!
customer_reviews.text: I have to follow a strict Low FODMAP diet and this is the first snack bar I’ve found that was tasty, had no artificial sweetener and agrees with my gut!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine S. Stehn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are delicious and i love packing them in my kids lunch for school. The simple ingredients make them a perfect go to. I can have a bar and a piece of fruit and it's a great meal on the go. We have liked every flavor we've tried.
customer_reviews.author: NGlass

customer_reviews.title: Cashew main ingredient.
customer_reviews.text: We discovered our son has an anaphylactic allergy to cashews after he had this Lara Bar. Very scary. We have no allergies in our family.l but also didn’t realize main ingredient was cashew.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Ymmy bars
customer_reviews.text: Yummy bars! We went gluten free with our son. It's very difficult to find bars which are healthy and tasty at the same time. I have tried other gluten free bars which, surprisingly, upset my stomach; this one does not. I love the taste. Yummy bars with just 100 calories. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Apps

customer_reviews.title: Melted and don't taste right.
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars but would not order from Amazon again. Arrived very hot and melted and now the flavor is off. Taste bad and maybe not safe anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Redboxredhead

customer_reviews.title: Kids Like Them
customer_reviews.text: My Grandchildren like these bars but have found something else they have been buying.
customer_reviews.author: Gramms & Gramps144

customer_reviews.title: Yuck to Chocolate Chip!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate chip cookie dough flavor tastes like chemicals. I ended up tossing them in the trash. I even left them on the counter in the lunch area at work and they stayed there for two weeks. I'm not sure about other flavors but chocolate chip is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Musty & Crushed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love LaraBars. I love the convenience of having them delivered to my house. I do not love the musty, MUSTY, crushed bars that I have continuously received. I will pay the extra couple of bucks for fresh bars. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Acookedgoose

customer_reviews.title: Always very happy with my Larabars
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been pleased with my Larabars. I’ve placed many orders over the past few years and will continue to do so. Excellent customer service, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cmarie22

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The best larabar flavor! A treat that's made out of good ingredients and relatively filling too!
customer_reviews.author: ak47

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Larabar flavors
customer_reviews.text: Love Larabar for minimal ingredients. Kids love them too. This is one of our favorite flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kolloff

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My entire family LOVES these things! They are sooooo tasty. Even my teen son likes them and prefers these over other snacks. It’s a win win for me. Purchasing more!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Yummy. Chocolate covered raisin flavored.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious but tastes like chocolate covered raisins, not cookie dough.
customer_reviews.author: Layla Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nice little snack between meals
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste and the convenience of throwing in my bag for the day. The boxes usually come crushed from shipping
customer_reviews.author: donna baker :)

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor of Larabars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite. I love them, and this is a deal! Whenever you can get them for less than $1 a bar, it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: April AS

customer_reviews.title: Prefer Pure Protein Bars - matter of taste
customer_reviews.text: Prefer Pure Protein Bars - matter of taste. Not really chewy.
customer_reviews.author: highlandhoh3

customer_reviews.title: Moldy... all of them.
customer_reviews.text: I generally never have problems with anything I order through Amazon. But I bought 2 boxes of these, and they were ALL moldy. In both boxes. Clearly this batch of LARABAR's needs to be thrown out. I am not sure how to get a refund, cause I already put them in the trash. Maybe this one is a loss! Careful if you buy these, check and smell before you eat. (the expiration date was fine, it said Aug 2018, and it's April 2018).
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the peanut chocolate chip & other Larabars, but this flavor is not my favorite. I tried one before buying the pack, then ehh. That first one was the only one I liked. Real sweet but- maybe should be seasonal?
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Fruit bars trying to trick you!
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves them. I do not. She eats super healthy and thinks these taste just like chocolate chip cookie dough. I think that eating healthy has distorted her mind. You can't trick me into thinking dates and chocolate chips are cookie dough. Nope. Not gonna fall for it. Give me my cookies.
customer_reviews.author: DMoney

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Larabars
customer_reviews.text: They are such a huge hit with my little one she LOVES them and I think they’re amazing as well such a filling snack for us both!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor ever
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flavor I don't even get any other kind any more lol
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of tea.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product with decent ingredients, they just don't fit my taste buds.
customer_reviews.author: ATM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bars had melted en route. I did not return them, but will if I get them a second time like this.
customer_reviews.author: donnagary

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disgusting. Not fresh, does not taste at all like the flavor stated on the package. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Not secured
customer_reviews.text: Bars were thrown all over the box. Box ripped open
customer_reviews.author: Aldunn87

customer_reviews.title: KIDS TAKE THESE FOR LUNCH :)
customer_reviews.text: My kids eat all the time & are growing like weeds - :) They like to take these to school for part of their lunch or for their snack time. Easy and feel they're a bit healthier. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Don't ever care for cookie dough all like that and loved them! Looking at different options that's all😉
customer_reviews.author: Jolie M.

customer_reviews.title: Love Lara Bars!
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate chip cookie dough lara bar and it's one of my favorites. I didn't see anything wrong with it, no opened packages or anything. Was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Box was open and one Larabar was STOLEN!
customer_reviews.text: Recently received an order of the Larabar Gluten Free Bar (Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough). I love these bars and love being able to buy 16 count boxes! HOWEVER, the order I recently received was rather disappointing. I opened the Amazon box to find the Larabar box opened and only 15 bars left in the box. BAD FORM, Amazon. You can do better! Or pay your employees more so they don't have to steal Larabars from customer's orders when they are hungry!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Cookie dough - oh yes!
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars. They are a real pick me up. I'not fond of the fruity ones but the cookie dough and peanut butters ones are out o this world. They go great with coffee.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gore

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bars with very little ingredients and most importantly, they taste awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Larabars yum
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite flavor. Normally I do banana bread but I've been caught up in the melty softness of the chips in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite snack. Taste great and hits the spot!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy I found these!
customer_reviews.text: I am eating mostly Paleo, but I can't eat almonds. This one has cashews and dates (many of the LARABAR bars have almonds). I like them five stars worth, but my family won't eat them. They are sweet because of the dates, so I shoot my sugar grams for the day. Great with coffee. I ordered Cashew Cookie, Blueberry Muffin, and Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, all cashew based. Love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jane

customer_reviews.title: Bad Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought these at target but with everything going on I have been ordering my snacks online, these are delicious (usually) but this time it was bad. I checked the expiration date and they were not past due, but the flavor was just so bad. I’m not sure why but I won’t be ordering these online anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Carrillo Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite granola bar. All healthy ingredients and even a good rating with the EWG
customer_reviews.author: Erica Chapin

customer_reviews.title: ... from my local grocery store and they always taste fine. When I got this order
customer_reviews.text: I buy Larabars every now and then from my local grocery store and they always taste fine. When I got this order, I had one the next day and I felt that they tasted a little off. I don't know what it was because I always bought cookie dough or brownie flavors before. I couldn't finish the rest of my box because the taste kept me from finishing each bar I had. I am a little disappointed :( I'll just buy them one by one from the store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flavor... IF you cool them. Not as good at room temp. The box was taped up and looked raggedy, but the bars were fine.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Schroeter

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: There is no chocolate flavor at all. No cookie dough flavor. You just taste the nuts and dates. I like the nuts and dates and the bars are fresh, but the taste isn't as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Bought these online bc I couldn’t find them anymore in my local grocery store. They were fresh and delicious!! Absolutely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: Vegan, Gluten free, non-GMO, on the go, and SUPER TASTY! What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Love Lara Bars
customer_reviews.text: Of all the flavors, cookie dough is our favorite for a night time snack. We love Lara bars because they have simple ingredients and are paleo, keto, other diet friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Parentsof5

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous! Tastes like the regular.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell the difference between these and the regular. Winner in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Workman

customer_reviews.title: Mold?
customer_reviews.text: Delicious until the very last one. This bar had some kind of webbing on the ends. Very disturbing to see. Will not be purchasing ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Smart in

product_meta.title: Larabar, Gluten Free Bar, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, Vegan (16 Bars)
product_meta.description: Size:16 Count (Pack of 1)Made from only real food, LARABAR Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough bar is a magical harmony of delicious fruits, whole nuts and indulgent, Fair Trade Certified chocolate chips. LARABAR Fruit & Nut Bars are always gluten free, dairy free, vegan and non-GMO.
feature_bullets: WHOLESOME FOOD: Tasty snack bars made with Fair Trade Certified, dairy-free chocolate chips
REAL FLAVORS: 6-ingredient bars made from a simple blend of cashews, dates, chocolate chips, apples, sea salt and vanilla extract.
SIMPLE INGREDIENTS: Gluten-free, non-GMO, dairy-free, vegan and Kosher.
CONVENIENT: Wholesome snacks for a busy, on-the go snack. Perfect for your active lifestyle.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
